deafened-spellcasting.label: Deafened - Spellcasting
deafened-spellcasting.note: Non-subtle spells require incantations, and all speech has the auditory trait.

light-level.label: Target - Light Level
light-level.note: Dim Light/Darkness if origin lacks low-light/darkvision

flat-check-in-message.name: Flat Check Buttons in Messages
flat-check-in-message.hint: Adds flat checks for supported conditions in chat messages.

flat-check-auto-roll.name: Auto-Roll Flat Checks
flat-check-auto-roll.hint: Rolls any flat checks on a message automatically

flat-check-auto-roll-user.name: Auto-Roll Flat Checks
flat-check-auto-roll-user.hint: User setting: Behaviour depends on the world setting

flat-check-targer-marker.name: Show Flat Check on Token
flat-check-targer-marker.hint: Client setting: Shows flat check info on a token when targeting.

light-level-vis.name: Light Level Visualization
light-level-vis.hint: Client setting: Hold alt to highlight squares with no/dim light.

delay-combat-tracker.name: Show Delay Button in Combat Tracker
delay-combat-tracker.hint: Adds delay/return buttons to the default combat tracker.

delay-token-hud.name: Show Delay Button in Token Hud
delay-token-hud.hint: Adds delay/return buttons to the menu that appears when right-clicking a token.

delay-return.name: Enable Return Button
delay-return.hint: Allows returning to initiative by pressing the delay button again.

delay-prompt.name: Prompt for New Initiative
delay-prompt.hint: Lets the user select a combatant to delay their turn after. Can still return early anytime they want.

token-hud-remove-combat-toggle.name: Remove Combat Toggle from Token Hud
token-hud-remove-combat-toggle.hint: Removes the 'Toggle Combat State' button for tokens in combat.

pf2e-hud-enable.name: Modify PF2e HUD
pf2e-hud-enable.hint: Overrides PF2e HUDs delay handling with this modules implementation. Please report issue with this to me and not to PF2e HUD!

lifelink.name: Enable Life/Spirit Link Automation Buttons
lifelink.hint: Check the module readme for setup steps.

lifelink-formular.name: Life Link Formular
lifelink-formular.hint: Variant of life link damage absorption to use.

script-alt-roll-breakdown.name: Alternative Roll Breakdowns
script-alt-roll-breakdown.hint: Reveals circumstance/status/untyped roll modifiers (e.g. multi attack penalty) to players.

script-toggle-shared-vision.name: Toggle Shared Vision in Combat
script-toggle-shared-vision.hint: Automaticlly turns the "Shared Party Vision" metagame setting off when combat starts, and enables it again when combat ends. This will override that setting, so only enable if you want to use shared vision.

docs.description: For a description of each feature and more details on the settings, check the documentation:

errors.combatant-not-owned: You do not own the current combatant

emanation.form-duration-title: Will ask for effect duration when applying to support Lingering Composition
emanation.form-formatting-error: Formatting error: Description contains no/multiple effect links.

message.tooltip-highest-dc: If more than one flat check would ever cause or prevent the same thing, just roll once and use the highest DC.
message.reroll-new-result: Reroll and keep the new result
message.reroll-lower-result: Reroll and keep the lower result
message.reroll-higher-result: Reroll and keep the higher result

life-link.spirit-link-error-bad-actor: Bad origin actor for Spirit Linked effect on {actor}! See module readme.
life-link.life-link-error-bad-actor: Bad origin actor for Life Linked effect on {actor}! See module readme.
life-link.share-life-error-bad-actor: Bad origin actor for Share Life effect on {actor}! See module readme.
